title: Becko Portable Puzzle Case, Non-Slip Surface, for Up to 1000 Pieces (Black)
features: Premium Material - Becko jigsaw puzzle board is processed with premium material, portable and sturdy. Covered with premium flannelette that helps to increase friction, it can effectively prevents jigsaw puzzles from sliding or falling. It is an indispensable piece of equipment for puzzle enthusiasts.

Unique Flap Closure Design - Closed and opened by hook and loop fasteners rather than traditional zipper closures, ensuring a snug fit. Soft flap cover can be folded or rolled up as the base to tilt the puzzle board at a small angle, which helps to save space and make the game easier.

Bonus Sorting Trays - Enclosed with 2 sorting trays that measures 20.5 × 15.3 each. Place them on the puzzles before closing up the flap to flatten and stabilize the jigsaw puzzles, or use them to sort and store the puzzles during the game.

Portable Design - The whole puzzle board weighs 8.11lbs (3.68kg), lighter than many of other puzzle boards. Designed with a handle for easy transport. Hang it on the wall when it is not in use to avoid being messed with by naughty kitties and doggies.
Product Size - Puzzle board measures 30.7 × 20.9in and applies to puzzles of up to 1,000 pieces.
description: Product Description Becko’s portable puzzle case can be an indispensable piece of equipment for puzzle enthusiasts. Covered with premium fabric, supple and durable. Puzzle and sorting trays are covered with soft flannelette, providing enough friction to prevent jigsaw puzzle from sliding and falling. Product Details Color: dark blue & black. Material: flannelette, terylene. Package Content: puzzle board with handle x 1, sorting tray x 2. Size of Puzzle Board: 31.5 × 21.5in / 80 × 54.5cm. Size of Sorting Trays: 20.8 x 15.3in / 52.8 x 38.8cm. Hold Puzzles Up to: 1000 pcs. Weight: 8.11lbs / 3.68kg. Features Portable Covered with flannelette Unique flap closure design Easy to store Keep away from naughty pets Instructions for Use 1. Fold or roll up the flap cover to save space while using the board. 2. Use the trays to sort and store jigsaw puzzles during the game. 3. Place the trays on the puzzles to flatten and stabilize. 4. Spread the flap cover and close with the hook and loop fasteners. Instructions for Use 1. Fold or roll up the flap cover to save space while using the board. 2. Use the trays to sort and store jigsaw puzzles during the game. 3. Place the trays on the puzzles to flatten and stabilize. 4. Spread the flap cover and close with the hook and loop fasteners.
